entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Athabasca
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
